page.title: 09MOULSECOOMB WILD PARK POEM
page.content:
We are so lucky to have a Wild Park with lots of lovely trees, With lots of wild animals as you and I can see. There's lots of wild flowers big and tall like me We are so lucky to have a Wild Park in Brighton as you can see.
Buzzing bees here they come buzzing through the air,upside down and turn around with a lovely sound to hear.
Look at the flowers, Look at the trees Look at all the bumble bees.
Butterfly's are so pretty.... all their colours are bright.... but your never see one.... at night.
